name: Unique Crops
description:
An encyclopedia about Unique Crops: how to obtain them, what they produce, and the general outline of each crops growth cycle or function.
Some of these crops are necessary for progression; for example, you'll need $(l:uc/seedenderlily)Ender Lilies/$ to obtain an $(l:chickens/enderpearl_chicken)Ender Pearl Chicken/$.$(br2)Most of the descriptions are plucked from the $(l:https://github.com/bafomdad/uniquecrops/wiki)Unique Crops wiki/$, with minor adjustments.
